_meta.source: Researched from Alaska cruise guides and Tongass National Forest

bbox_hint.note: Covers Endicott Arm fjord, Dawes Glacier, and Fords Terror inlet

featured_experiences.name: Fjord Scenic Cruising
featured_experiences.note: Ship navigates through floating ice. Wildlife includes seals and eagles.

featured_experiences.name: Dawes Glacier Viewing
featured_experiences.note: More intimate than Hubbard. Seals often haul out on ice floes.

featured_experiences.name: Fords Terror (Small Ship)
featured_experiences.note: Only accessible by small ships/kayaks during slack tide.
